import React from "react"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {Link, Navigate} from "react-router-dom"; export function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemsPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0)); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? toPrice(0) : toPrice(10); cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.20 * cart.itemsPrice); cart.totalPrice = toPrice(cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice); return (
{!cart.paymentMethod && }

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      ${item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • )) }

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${cart.itemsPrice}
  • Shipping
    ${cart.shippingPrice}
  • Tax
    ${cart.taxPrice}
  • Order Total
    ${cart.totalPrice}
) }
